## StringEncoding class

A character encoding, known to the Core Foundation framework.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class StringEncoding 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cfStringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.cfstringencoding.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The numeric identifier of this [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [ianaCharSetName](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.ianacharsetname.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The IANA character set name that is the closest mapping to this [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [name](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.name.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The canonical name of this [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->. This is likely (but not guaranteed) to be a unique identifier for each distinct encoding. |
|  [nsStringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.nsstringencoding.md) |  | <code>number &#124; null</code> | The Cocoa encoding constant that is the closest mapping to this [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [system](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.system.md) | <code>static</code> | <code>StringEncoding</code> | The default [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) used by the operating system when it creates strings. |
|  [windowsCodepage](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.windowscodepage.md) |  | <code>number &#124; null</code> | The Windows codepage that is the closest mapping to this [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [byCFStringEncoding(id)](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.bycfstringencoding.md) | <code>static</code> | Looks up a [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) by its [numeric identifier](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/corefoundation/cfstringencoding?language=objc)<!-- -->. |
|  [byIANACharSetName(charset)](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.byianacharsetname.md) | <code>static</code> | Looks up a [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) by corresponding IANA character set identifier. |
|  [byNSStringEncoding(nsStringEncoding)](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.bynsstringencoding.md) | <code>static</code> | Looks up a [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) by corresponding Cocoa encoding constant. |
|  [byWindowsCodepage(codepage)](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.bywindowscodepage.md) | <code>static</code> | Looks up a [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) by corresponding Windows codepage. |
|  [decode(text, options)](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.decode.md) |  | Decodes the given text. |
|  [encode(text, options)](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.encode.md) |  | Encodes the given text. |
|  [equals(other)](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.equals.md) |  | Returns whether the given [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) represents the same encoding as this one. |

## Remarks

Each instance of this class represents a [CFStringEncoding](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/corefoundation/cfstringencoding?language=objc) value.
